en: Not good this place sucks. I'm dying to leave.
As expected. You should also go move you know?

column3: its been awhile since we met.

keys: I've been meaning to meet again
en: but I'm busy thinking of moving away right now.

keys: You should also consider moving with me
en: Otty Town has the best places around.

keys: Anyway unless something new opens in town
en: I guess we'll just talk again later.
